title: Authors and Citation
text: Nicola Rennie. Author, maintainer.

title: Authors and Citation
text: Rennie N (2022). aRt: Generative Art R. R package version 1.2.6, https://nrennie.github.io/aRt/.
code: @Manual{,   title = {aRt: Generative Art with R},   author = {Nicola Rennie},   year = {2022},   note = {R package version 1.2.6},   url = {https://nrennie.github.io/aRt/}, }

title: Generative Art with R
text: aRt R package create generative art.

title: Generative Art with R
text: Install using:
code: devtools::install_github("nrennie/aRt") remotes::install_github("nrennie/aRt")

title: Generative Art with R
text: functions previous releases {aRt} package took names colour palettes arguments. colour palettes came external R packages, names palettes necessarily obvious. functions updated allow choice colours, rather restricting user single package choose palettes.

title: Generative Art with R
text: abacus() function produces generative art based points lines.
code: abacus(nx = 30, ny = 100, max_size = 2, main_col = "black", bg_col = "white", s = 123) abacus(nx = 20, ny = 10, max_size = 4, main_col = "white", bg_col = "black", s = 12) abacus(nx = 100, ny = 100, max_size = 3, main_col = "#008080", bg_col = "white", s = 123)

title: Generative Art with R
text: attraction() function produces generative art based strange attractors.
code: attraction(n=50000, a=-3, b=1, c=0.5, d=-1, main_col="black", bg_col="white") attraction(n=50000, a=-6, b=1, c=0.5, d=-2, main_col="black", bg_col="white") attraction(n=50000, a=-3, b=-2, c=1, d=-1, main_col=rcartocolor::carto_pal(n = 7, "SunsetDark"), bg_col="white")

title: Generative Art with R
text: blending() function produces generative art many boxes.
code: blending(n = 100, down = "white", up = "black", s = 1234) blending(n = 500, down = "white", up = "black", s = 1234) blending(n = 100, down = "#ba1141", up = "#003366", s = 1234)

title: Generative Art with R
text: boxes() function produces generative art many boxes.
code: boxes(n=100, perc=0.1, col_palette=rcartocolor::carto_pal(n = 7, "DarkMint"), bg_col="black", s=1234) boxes(n=20, perc=0.1, col_palette=rcartocolor::carto_pal(n = 7, "DarkMint"), bg_col="black", s=1234) boxes(n=100, perc=0.5, col_palette=rcartocolor::carto_pal(n = 7, "Magenta"), bg_col="black", s=1234)

title: Generative Art with R
text: bricks() function draws multiple rectangular polygons rows.
code: bricks(n_y=20, colours=c("#9B1D20", "#3D2B3D", "#CBEFB6", "#635D5C"), bg_col="gray97") bricks(n_y=200, colours=c("#9B1D20", "#3D2B3D", "#CBEFB6", "#635D5C"), bg_col="gray97") bricks(n_y=20, colours=rcartocolor::carto_pal(7, "Burg"), bg_col="gray97")

title: Generative Art with R
text: bubbles() function produces generative art using layered polar bar charts.
code: bubbles(num_circles = 20, main_col = "black", col_palette = rcartocolor::carto_pal(n = 12, "Bold"), bg_col = "white", s = 1234) bubbles(num_circles = 20, main_col = "lightgrey", col_palette = rcartocolor::carto_pal(n = 12, "Bold"), bg_col = "white", s = 123) bubbles(num_circles = 10, main_col = "white", col_palette = rcartocolor::carto_pal(n = 12, "Prism"), bg_col = "black", s = 2022)

title: Generative Art with R
text: bullseye() function produces generative art using layered polar bar charts.
code: bullseye(main_col="black", bg_col="white", s=1234) bullseye(main_col="white", bg_col="black", s=1234) bullseye(main_col="black", bg_col="white", s=2021)

title: Generative Art with R
text: circles() function produces generative art using dendograms circular graphs.
code: circles(n=100, smoothness=100, col_palette=rcartocolor::carto_pal(n = 12, "Bold"), line_col=NA, bg_col="black", s=1234) circles(n=10, smoothness=100, col_palette=rcartocolor::carto_pal(n = 12, "Bold"), line_col=NA, bg_col="#e73f74", s=1234) circles(n=2, smoothness=3, col_palette=rcartocolor::carto_pal(n = 12, "Bold"), line_col="black", bg_col="black", s=1234)

title: Generative Art with R
text: circular() function produces circular generative art produced many random paths centre circle.
code: circular(n=2, main_col="black", bg_col="white", s=56) circular(n=10, main_col="black", bg_col="white", s=56) circular(n=100, main_col="black", bg_col="white", s=56)

title: Generative Art with R
text: connected() function produces generative art connected points circle.
code: connected(n=100, n_geom=10, random=F, col_palette=RColorBrewer::brewer.pal(n = 9,"RdPu"), bg_col="#ae217e", s=1234) connected(n=100, n_geom=10, random=T, col_palette=RColorBrewer::brewer.pal(n = 9,"RdPu"), bg_col="#ae217e", s=1234) connected(n=250, n_geom=2, random=F, col_palette=RColorBrewer::brewer.pal(n = 5,"RdPu"), bg_col="#ae217e", s=1234)

title: Generative Art with R
text: crawling() function produces generative art using dendograms tree graphs.
code: crawling(n=50, edge_colour="black", node_size=1, node_colour="black", bg_col="white", s=1234) crawling(n=250, edge_colour="black", node_size=1, node_colour="black", bg_col="white", s=1234) crawling(n=1000, edge_colour="black", node_size=1, node_colour="black", bg_col="white", s=1234)

title: Generative Art with R
text: dots() function produces generative art using jittered points.
code: dots(n_x=50, n_y=100, jitter_size_width=0.5, jitter_size_height=0.5, col_palette = rcartocolor::carto_pal(n = 7, "Purp"), bg_col="#63589f", s=1234) dots(n_x=500, n_y=100, jitter_size_width=0.5, jitter_size_height=5, col_palette = rcartocolor::carto_pal(n = 7, "Purp"), bg_col="#63589f", s=1234) dots(n_x=50, n_y=100, jitter_size_width=0.05, jitter_size_height=50, col_palette = rcartocolor::carto_pal(n = 7, "Purp"), bg_col="#63589f", s=1234)

title: Generative Art with R
text: fading() function produces generative art using voronoi tiles.
code: fading(n_layers=6, n_points=10, col_palette=rcartocolor::carto_pal(n = 7, "SunsetDark"), s=1234) fading(n_layers=6, n_points=1, col_palette=rcartocolor::carto_pal(n = 7, "Sunset"), s=1234) fading(n_layers=10, n_points=10, col_palette=rcartocolor::carto_pal(n = 7, "SunsetDark"), s=1234)

title: Generative Art with R
text: flow_fields() function produces generative art using particle traces. functions inspired blog post Chase.
code: flow_fields(n = 10000, granualarity = 1000, x_freq = 1, y_freq = 1, alpha = 1, line_col = c("#edf8fb","#bfd3e6","#9ebcda","#8c96c6","#8c6bb1","#88419d","#6e016b"), bg_col = "lightgrey", s = 1234) flow_fields(n = 10000, granualarity = 1000, x_freq = 1, y_freq = 1, alpha = 0.3, line_col = "black", bg_col = "white", s = 1234) flow_fields(n = 10000, granualarity = 1000, x_freq = 3, y_freq = 0.2, alpha = 1, line_col = c("#edf8fb","#bfd3e6","#9ebcda","#8c96c6","#8c6bb1","#88419d","#6e016b"), bg_col = "lightgrey", s = 1234)

title: Generative Art with R
text: fractals() function produces generative art based fractal patterns. functions inspired blog post R-bloggers.
code: fractals(N = 25, col_palette = MetBrewer::met.brewer("Demuth", n = 25),          shift = 0, left = -1, right = 1,          y_param = 3, resolution = 0.005, dist_max = 4) fractals(N = 25, col_palette = rev(MetBrewer::met.brewer("Benedictus", n = 25)),          shift = 0, left = -3, right = 3,          y_param = 2, resolution = 0.005, dist_max = 4) fractals(N = 20, col_palette = grey.colors(30),          shift = -1, left = -1, right = 1,          y_param = 2, resolution = 0.005, dist_max = 3)

title: Generative Art with R
text: heart() function draws heart many overlapping lines.
code: heart(n=25, col_scheme="mono", bg_col="black", s=1234) heart(n=100, col_scheme="mono", bg_col="black", s=1234) heart(n=25, col_scheme="rainbow", bg_col="black", s=1234)

title: Generative Art with R
text: infinity() function draws infinity symbol many overlapping lines.
code: infinity(n=25, col_scheme="mono", bg_col="black", s=1234) infinity(n=100, col_scheme="mono", bg_col="black", s=1234) infinity(n=25, col_scheme="rainbow", bg_col="black", s=1234)

title: Generative Art with R
text: mosaic() function creates set voronoi tiles.
code: mosaic(n = 100, fill_cols = c("#4B3F72", "#CBB3BF", "#FFC857", "#119DA4", "#19647E"), line_col = "white", bg_col = "white", line_size = 1, x_means = c(0, 10, 5), y_means = c(0, 7, 8), xy_var = 2, s = 1234) mosaic(n = 100, fill_cols = "white", line_col = "black", bg_col = "black", line_size = 1, x_means = 0, y_means = 0, xy_var = 5, s = 1234) mosaic(n = 500, fill_cols = c("#436f85", "#432263", "#de7a00", "#416322", "#860a4d"), line_col = "white", bg_col = "white", line_size = 0.5, x_means = c(0, 10, 5), y_means = c(0, 7, 8), xy_var = 2, s = 1234)

title: Generative Art with R
text: mosaic_sketch() function creates set voronoi tiles hand-drawn feel.
code: mosaic_sketch(n = 10, fill_cols = c("#4B3F72", "#CBB3BF", "#FFC857", "#119DA4", "#19647E"), line_col = "white", bg_col = "white", line_size = 2, x_means = c(0, 10, 5), y_means = c(0, 7, 8), xy_var = 2, s = 1234) mosaic_sketch(n = 20, fill_cols = c("white", "#008080"), line_col = "white", bg_col = "#008080", line_size = 1.5, x_means = c(0, 10, 5), y_means = c(0, 7, 8), xy_var = 2, s = 1234) mosaic_sketch(n = 6, fill_cols = "black", line_col = "white", bg_col = "white", line_size = 2, x_means = c(0, 10, 5), y_means = c(0, 7, 8), xy_var = 2, s = 1234)

title: Generative Art with R
text: polygons() function draws multiple polygons.
code: polygons(n_x=12, n_y=18, gap_size=0.5, deg_jitter=0.1, colours=c("#9B1D20", "#3D2B3D", "#CBEFB6", "#635D5C"), rand = FALSE, bg_col="gray97") polygons(n_x=6, n_y=9, gap_size=0.2, deg_jitter=0.1, colours=c("#9B1D20", "#3D2B3D", "#CBEFB6", "#635D5C"), rand = FALSE, bg_col="gray97") polygons(n_x=12, n_y=18, gap_size=0.5, deg_jitter=0.5, colours=rcartocolor::carto_pal(7, "Burg"), rand = FALSE, bg_col="gray97")

title: Generative Art with R
text: rectangles() function draws multiple rectangles.
code: rectangles(n = 100, max_height = 7, max_width = 5, size = 2, main_col = "lightgrey", col_palette = rcartocolor::carto_pal(n = 12, "Bold"), bg_col = "white", s = 123) rectangles(n = 10, max_height = 15, max_width = 15, size = 4, main_col = "lightgrey", col_palette = rcartocolor::carto_pal(n = 12, "Bold"), bg_col = "white", s = 123) rectangles(n = 100, max_height = 4, max_width = 6, size = 1, main_col = ggplot2::alpha("white", 0.5), col_palette = rcartocolor::carto_pal(n = 12, "Prism"), bg_col = "black", s = 123)

title: Generative Art with R
text: shells() function produces generative art using sine cosine waves.
code: shells(n = 4, alpha = 1, main_col = "black", bg_col = "white") shells(n = 10, alpha = 1, main_col = "black", bg_col = "white") shells(n = 6, alpha = 0.5, main_col = "#CC338B", bg_col = alpha("#CC338B", 0.2))

title: Generative Art with R
text: spirals() function produces generative art consisting dots arranged spiral.
code: spirals(perc=0.2, s=1234) spirals(perc=0.5, s=1234) spirals(perc=0.8, s=1234)

title: Generative Art with R
text: squares() function produces generative art consisting pattern-filled squares.
code: squares(n = 7, line_col = "white", pattern_col = "white", pattern_fill = "black", pattern_size = 0.4, size = 1.5, s = 1234) squares(n = 5, line_col = "#2DC2BD", pattern_col = "#392759", pattern_fill = "#2DC2BD", pattern_size = 0.4, size = 1.5, s = 5678) squares(n = 20, line_col = "white", pattern_col = "white", pattern_fill = "black", pattern_size = 0.4, size = 1.5, s = 1234)

title: Generative Art with R
text: static() function produces generative art reminiscent noise displayed analog televisions transmission signal received.
code: static(perc=0.01, n=500, s=1234) static(perc=0.1, n=500, s=1234) static(perc=0.3, n=500, s=1234)

title: Generative Art with R
text: streams() function produces generative art consisting stream charts.
code: streams(bg_col = "white", line_col = "white", fill_col = c("#5F4690", "#1D6996", "#38A6A5", "#0F8554", "#73AF48", "#EDAD08", "#E17C05", "#CC503E", "#94346E", "#6F4070"), type = "right", s = 1234) streams(bg_col = "black", line_col = NA, fill_col = grey.colors(n = 25), type = "up", s = 450) streams(bg_col = "white", line_col = NA, fill_col = rep("purple", 8), type = "left", s = 13)

title: Generative Art with R
text: stripes() function produces generative art consisting rows vertical stripes.
code: stripes(perc=0, n=3, col_palette = rcartocolor::carto_pal(n = 7, "TealGrn"), alpha = 1, s=1234) stripes(perc=0.5, n=3, col_palette = rcartocolor::carto_pal(n = 7, "TealGrn"), alpha = 1, s=1234) stripes(perc=1, n=3, col_palette = rcartocolor::carto_pal(n = 7, "TealGrn"), alpha = 1, s=1234)

title: Generative Art with R
text: sunbursts() function produces generative art consisting two-dimesional density plots.
code: sunbursts(n = 100, x_means = c(0, 10, 5), y_means = c(0, 7, 8), xy_var = 5, low = "#074050", high = "#d3f2a3", s = 1234) sunbursts(n = 5, x_means = c(0, 1, 15), y_means = c(0, 2, 16), xy_var = 10, low = "#4e0550", high = "#facdfc", s = 1234) sunbursts(n = 250, x_means = c(1, 2, 9, 50), y_means = c(3, 6, 8, -3), xy_var = 100, low = "white", high = "black", s = 1234)

title: Generative Art with R
text: tiles() function produces generative art using square polygons.
code: tiles(n_x=12, n_y=12, col_palette=MetBrewer::met.brewer("Veronese", 5), s=1234) tiles(n_x=50, n_y=50, col_palette=MetBrewer::met.brewer("Veronese", 6), s=1234) tiles(n_x=12, n_y=12, col_palette=MetBrewer::met.brewer("Pissaro", 5), s=1234)

title: Generative Art with R
text: vortex() function produces circular vortex generative art produced line plot polar coordinates.
code: vortex(n=25, start_val=90, col_scheme="mono", bg_col="black", s=1234) vortex(n=100, start_val=90, col_scheme="mono", bg_col="black", s=1234) vortex(n=25, start_val=90, col_scheme="rainbow", bg_col="black", s=1234)

title: Generative Art with R
text: waves() function produces generative art using sine cosine waves.
code: waves(a=23, b=6, main_col="white", bg_col="black", s=2021) waves(a=23, b=6, main_col=rcartocolor::carto_pal(n = 7, "Prism"), bg_col="#edad08", s=2021) waves(a=6, b=23, main_col="black", bg_col="white", s=2021)

what: aRt: Generative Art with R — aRt-package
title: aRt: Generative Art with R — aRt-package
text: Creates generative art using R.

title: aRt: Generative Art with R — aRt-package
text: Maintainer: Nicola Rennie nrennie35@gmail.com

title: Abacus — abacus
text: function generates generative art ggplot object using points lines.

title: Abacus — abacus
code: abacus(   nx = 30,   ny = 100,   max_size = 2,   main_col = "black",   bg_col = "white",   s = 123 )

title: Abacus — abacus
text: nx Number lines x direction. Default 30. ny Number points per line. Default 100. max_size Maximum size points. Default 2. main_col Vector colours (single colour). Default "black". bg_col Background colour. Default "white". s Random seed. Default 123.

title: Abacus — abacus
text: ggplot object.

title: Attraction — attraction
text: function generates generative art ggplot object using strange attractors.

title: Attraction — attraction
code: attraction(   n = 5000,   a = -3,   b = 1,   c = 0.5,   d = -1,   main_col = "black",   bg_col = "white" )

title: Attraction — attraction
text: n Number points. Default 5000. Parameter. Default -3. b Parameter. Default 1. c Parameter. Default 0.5. d Parameter. Default -1. main_col Vector colours (single colour). Default "black". bg_col Background colour. Default "white".

title: Attraction — attraction
text: ggplot object.

title: Blending — blending
text: function generates generative art ggplot object using random walk.

title: Blending — blending
code: blending(n = 100, down = "white", up = "black", s = 1234)

title: Blending — blending
text: n Number point. Default 100. Colour use bottom. Default "white". Colour use top. Default "black". s Seed value. Default 1234.

title: Blending — blending
text: ggplot object.

title: Boxes — boxes
text: function generates coloured generative art ggplot object treemaps.

title: Boxes — boxes
code: boxes(   n = 100,   perc = 0.1,   col_palette = rcartocolor::carto_pal(n = 7, "DarkMint"),   bg_col = "black",   s = 1234 )

title: Boxes — boxes
text: n Number boxes perc Relationship box size colour. Value 0 1 0 represents randomness 1 perfect identical. Default 0.1. col_palette Vector colours. Default "DarkMint" colour palette rcartocolor. bg_col Background colour. Default "black". s Seed value. Default 1234.

title: Boxes — boxes
text: ggplot object.

title: Bricks — bricks
text: function generates coloured generative art ggplot object using polygons.

title: Bricks — bricks
code: bricks(   n_y = 20,   colours = c("#9B1D20", "#3D2B3D", "#CBEFB6", "#635D5C"),   bg_col = "gray97",   s = 1234 )

title: Bricks — bricks
text: n_y Number rows. Default 20. colours Vector colours. Can length. Default c("#9B1D20", "#3D2B3D", "#CBEFB6", "#635D5C"). bg_col Background colour. Default "gray97". s Seed value. Default 1234.

title: Bricks — bricks
text: ggplot object.

title: Bubbles — bubbles
text: function generates generative art ggplot object consisting circles filled ellipses.

title: Bubbles — bubbles
code: bubbles(   num_circles = 20,   main_col = "black",   col_palette = rcartocolor::carto_pal(n = 12, "Bold"),   bg_col = "white",   s = 1234 )

title: Bubbles — bubbles
text: num_circles Number circles. Default 20. main_col Colour non-highlighted rectangles. Default "black". col_palette Vector colours. Default "Bold" colour palette rcartocolor. Must 12 colours. bg_col Background colour. Default "white". s Seed value. Default 1234.

title: Bubbles — bubbles
text: ggplot object

title: Bullseye — bullseye
text: function generates layered generative art ggplot object using polar bar charts.

title: Bullseye — bullseye
code: bullseye(main_col = "black", bg_col = "white", s = 1234)

title: Bullseye — bullseye
text: main_col Colour scheme art. One c("mono", "rainbow). Default "black". bg_col Background colour. Default "white". s Seed value. Default 1234.

title: Bullseye — bullseye
text: ggplot object.

title: Circles — circles
text: function generates coloured generative art ggplot object using dendograms circular graphs.

title: Circles — circles
code: circles(   n = 100,   smoothness = 100,   col_palette = rcartocolor::carto_pal(n = 12, "Bold"),   line_col = NA,   bg_col = "black",   s = 1234 )

title: Circles — circles
text: n Number nodes. Default 10. smoothness Smoothness lines circles. Default 100. col_palette Vector colours. Default "Bold" colour palette rcartocolor. line_col Background colour. Default NA. bg_col Background colour. Default "black". s Seed value. Default 1234.

title: Circles — circles
text: ggplot object.

title: Circular — circular
text: function generates abstract circular generative art ggplot object.

title: Circular — circular
code: circular(n = 100, main_col = "black", bg_col = "white", s = 56)

title: Circular — circular
text: n Number steps inside outside. Default 100. main_col Colour lines. Default black. bg_col Background colour. Default white. s Seed value. Default 56.

title: Circular — circular
text: ggplot object.

title: Connected — connected
text: function generates generative art ggplot object connecting points arcs circle.

title: Connected — connected
code: connected(   n = 100,   n_geom = 2,   random = FALSE,   col_palette = RColorBrewer::brewer.pal(n = 9, "RdPu"),   bg_col = "#ae217e",   s = 1234 )

title: Connected — connected
text: n Number lines start. Default 100. n_geom Number points along path create. Default 2. random Boolean value whether randomise plotting order edges. col_palette Vector colours. Default "RdPu" colour palette RColorBrewer. bg_col Background colour. Default "#ae217e". s Seed value. Default 1234.

title: Connected — connected
text: ggplot object.

title: Crawling — crawling
text: function generates generative art ggplot object using dendograms.

title: Crawling — crawling
code: crawling(   n = 50,   edge_colour = "black",   node_size = 1,   node_colour = "black",   bg_col = "white",   s = 1234 )

title: Crawling — crawling
text: n Number nodes. edge_colour Edge colour. Default "black". node_size Node size. Default 1. node_colour Node colour. Default "black". bg_col Background colour. Default "white". s Seed value. Default 1234.

title: Crawling — crawling
text: ggplot object.

title: Dots — dots
text: function generates coloured generative art ggplot object using polar coordinates.

title: Dots — dots
code: dots(   n_x = 50,   n_y = 100,   jitter_size_width = 0.5,   jitter_size_height = 0.5,   col_palette = rcartocolor::carto_pal(n = 7, "Purp"),   bg_col = "#63589f",   s = 1234 )

title: Dots — dots
text: n_x Number rotational points. Default 50. n_y Number outwards points. Default 100. jitter_size_width Size jitter width. Default 0.5. jitter_size_height Size jitter height. Default 0.5. col_palette Vector colours. Default "Purp" colour palette rcartocolor. bg_col Background colour. Default "#63589f". s Seed value. Default 1234.

title: Dots — dots
text: ggplot object.

title: Fading — fading
text: function generates coloured generative art ggplot object using voronoi tiles.

title: Fading — fading
code: fading(   n_layers = 6,   n_points = 10,   col_palette = rcartocolor::carto_pal(n = 7, "SunsetDark"),   s = 1234 )

title: Fading — fading
text: n_layers Number layers. Default 6. n_points Number points per layer area. Default 10. col_palette Vector colours. Default "SunsetDark" colour palette rcartocolor. s Seed value. Default 1234.

title: Fading — fading
text: ggplot object.

title: Flow fields — flow_fields
text: function generates generative art ggplot object using particle traces. See also https://www.williamrchase.com/post/flow-fields-12-months--art-september/

title: Flow fields — flow_fields
code: flow_fields(   n = 10000,   granualarity = 1000,   x_freq = 1,   y_freq = 1,   alpha = 1,   line_col = c("#edf8fb", "#bfd3e6", "#9ebcda", "#8c96c6", "#8c6bb1", "#88419d",     "#6e016b"),   bg_col = "lightgrey",   s = 1234 )

title: Flow fields — flow_fields
text: n Number lines. Default 10000. granualarity fine draw grid. Default 1000. x_freq Frequency x simplex noise. Default 1. y_freq Frequency y simplex noise. Default 1. alpha Transparency lines. Default 1. line_col Line colours. Vector (single element) colours. Default c("#edf8fb","#bfd3e6","#9ebcda","#8c96c6","#8c6bb1","#88419d","#6e016b") bg_col Background colour. Default "white". s Seed value. Default 1234.

title: Flow fields — flow_fields

title: Fractals — fractals
text: function generates generative art ggplot object using fractal patterns. Inspired https://www.r-bloggers.com/2010/08/fractals--r/

title: Fractals — fractals
code: fractals(   N = 25,   col_palette = MetBrewer::met.brewer("Demuth", n = 25),   shift = 0,   left = -1,   right = 1,   y_param = 3,   resolution = 0.005,   dist_max = 4 )

title: Fractals — fractals
text: N Number iterations. Default 25. col_palette Vector colours length >= N. Default MetBrewer::met.brewer("Demuth", n = 25). shift Offset y-values. Default 0. left Start rangle x-axis. Default -1. right End range x-axis. Default 1. y_param Rate y growth. Default 3. resolution Resolution grid. Default 0.005. dist_max Size center area. Default 4.

title: Fractals — fractals
text: ggplot object.

title: Polygons — polygons
text: n_x Number polygons per row. Default 12. n_y Number polygons per column. Default 18. gap_size Numeric 0 1 specifying size gap polygons. Default 0.5. deg_jitter Numeric 0 0.5 specifying degree jitter. Default 0.1. colours Vector colours. Can length. Default c("#9B1D20", "#3D2B3D", "#CBEFB6", "#635D5C"). rand Boolean whether colours random ordered. Default FALSE. bg_col Background colour. Default "gray97". s Seed value. Default 1234.

title: Rectangles — rectangles

Default "white". s Seed value. Default 123.
